segments.text: Yes , I can , but not very well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you understand your Spanish teacher ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: More or less . How well do you understand Mr . Wang , your Chinese teacher ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: About 40 percent , if he speaks slowly.When he speaks fast , I can only catch a word here and there . But Mr . Wang is an excellent Chinese teacher.With his help , my Chinese is getting better and better e
segments.speaker: S1
